title: Thymoma
summary: A thymoma is a tumor originating from the epithelial cells of the thymus that is considered a rare malignancy. Thymomas are frequently associated with neuromuscular disorders such as  myasthenia gravis;[1] thymoma is found in 20% of patients with myasthenia gravis.[2] Once diagnosed, thymomas may be removed surgically. In the rare case of a malignant tumor, chemotherapy may be used.
